author: Anne VanDyke
comment: I like this watch face a lot, however for the two days I've had it running,  my battery ran OUT by 8pm.  With other faces I still had 60% by bedtime.  I don't know what might be causing it,  unless it's the quotes that randomly appear.  I love what the quotes have to say,  in fact that's one of my favorite parts.  However they don't stay long enough to be able to read the tiny text.  I guess it's a good thing they appear often.  If the battery issue is fixed I'll gladly change to a 5 as this is my favorite!
title: Love it but it eats thru my battery!

author: Christopher Woodside
comment: Nice design but the second hand lags and looks broken and pixelated, really bad.  Not many settings so face disappears in just a few seconds, not even enough time to read it...really annoying. Uninstalling, there are many better simple beautiful faces that work great! Needs work!
title: Bad lag graphics compared to most

author: Jesse Duffy
comment: Looks great,  but I can't even read the full quote in time before it goes away, it's like two seconds and is hard to read that quick on such a tiny screen.
title: Pretty, But quotes need to be longer

author: andrew mock
comment: Excellence and elegance all in one simple face! My only complaint is the quote goes away to quickly and I can read it all, otherwise superb.
title: My favorite so far!

author: Nick Orie
comment: Wonderful design, horrible resolution. I have a huawei watch and the face looks like garbage, nothing is sharp and it's almost impossible to read the small dial and date because of this.

author: Paul Komarnicki
comment: Quote cannot be dismissed and is shown too long.
title: Quotes make it useless

author: Brandon Rice
comment: Love the watch face, but the quotes need to stay up for a longer period of time, or maybe enable a tap to dismiss feature? Also, I would like to see quotes more frequently, perhaps create an option to set how many steps trigger a quote? Those features would make this a five star app.
title: A couple revisions would make this five stars.

author: Joshua Hill
comment: Love the watchface but the quotes are too intrusive. Please give users an option to set how often quotes appear or disable them completely.
title: Beautiful watchface ruined by quotes

author: Nick
comment: I found if Moto360 doesn't look right at first. Just change the watchface in your phone and then return back to this one. Should align properly the 2nd time around.
title: Moto360 folks

author: Greg Mapes
comment: I like the minimalism of the clock, not enough of them in Play Store but not thrilled with how many times the quote keeps coming up. I want a watch screen, not a quote screen.
title: Like the minimalism but...

author: Kash K
comment: Great looking watch face,, perfect balanced watch.. Hope I can customise it one day..  And also The quotes go away too quickly..
title: Nice one

author: John Ginzo
comment: It has two faces one main face and small face but the small one is just the same time widget with no customization.  Um...did you just release this before finishing it?
title: Pretty silly watch face. Uninstalling

author: Juan Torres
comment: Love the idea...I get 1.5 seconds to read the quote maybe less =(. Please fix it, I love this watch face, maybe a color picker. I think itd be one of the best faces hands down.
title: Quotes need longer display time

author: Calvin On
comment: 4 stars for a watchface that balances well between looking good and providing just the right amount of info.  -2 stars for the message that keeps replacing the actual watch face, which renders the whole point of the watchface moot.

author: Gustav Brändström
comment: Eva Ättling gör bara snygga saker, och denna är definitivt just det. Men! Jag kan inte anpassa den alls.
title: Snygg men inga inställningar

author: Tyler Young
comment: 2 stars for lack of control over the quote's. Would be 5 other wise, beautiful watch face.
title: No quote option

author: Jonh Cascade
comment: It does not even show up on my homepage and does not give option to open in app store.
title: No idea whats happening

author: Antwan L. Payne
comment: Looks great on my Moto 360!  Classic, but not gaudy!  It's made it to my daily rotation of watchfaces!

author: Andrew Worrall
comment: Tried everything.. Nexus 6 5.1.1
title: Moto 360 won't install

author: Christophe Sterkens
comment: Would love an option to turn of the random quotes.
title: Random quotes

author: Anthony Meikle
comment: Need a setting to not have quotes.
title: Good but...

author: Kenneth Jerney
comment: Favorite but the ambient bug thanks to Android wear makes the black face only usable

author: Ken C
comment: Would be nice to extend the time the quote stays on the screen never have enough time to read it.

author: kwelis williams
comment: Works for my needs

author: Reza Esmaili
comment: That's good enough to keep for 2 days
title: Good

author: Arif Zainal
comment: It is not very clear
title: It could be much better

author: Book Smart Tutors
comment: Could be improved
title: Not clear with huawei watch

author: Raven Blaze
comment: Just give me quote customization!

author: Ian Lee
comment: Best watchface ever. Love the quotes either.

author: krz vudu
comment: Lukx gr8
title: Luv it

author: Mattias Öhrn
comment: I love the design of the watch face. Looks beautiful on the LG Watch Urbane. However, the messages that keep replacing the actual watch face all the time makes it close to useless.  A watch face that doesn't show the time half the times you glance at it kind of defeats it's own purpose. Five stars if the messages are removed or made optional through configuration.

author: Barrett Forish
comment: Looks horrible on the Moto 360. The stock watch faces do the exact same thing and look great. Text is blurry and distorted. Not sure how it maintains a four star rating.
title: Ok for free

author: Deron Dantzler
comment: The Moto 360 bug is real and unfortunate. It looks like it would be one of my favorites if not for the bug.

author: Andras Nagy
comment: It's completely off center on Moto360. There are black marks on the right side, much like the flat tire on the bottom...... comon.

author: Israel Méndez
comment: Doesn't look right on Moto360.  A 'flat tire' is added on the dial side, not on the actual 'flat tire' on the watch, so it's like having an offset watch inside your own watch.

author: Jaxon Lee
comment: Maybe it's the fact that I'm on 5.1.1 on my moto 360, but this watchface looks fine. Not blurry and the flat tire is at the bottom where it's supposed to be. And with a black watchface, I don't notice the flat tire.
title: My moto 360 has no issues with it

author: Shawn Altorio
comment: I like the design. Unfortunately, as other's have pointed out the alignment is off on the Moto 360. What's odd is that the initial animation folks the screen perfectly.

author: Michael Kruse
comment: The watchface itself looks great, but it gets interrupted by messages that you have to wake up the watch to dismiss.

author: TJ Gregson
comment: Blurry on Moto360
title: Can't read.

author: Ryan Chan
comment: Doesn't work on the Moto360
